descriptionHTML:
Survival Game is a free highly addictive mind challenging game. The best Smove Survival Game ever. It is best time to test your survival skills & become highest scored player on leaderboard.

Swipe your finger & move the green circle up, down, left & right and collect as many yellow points as you can to get high score but make sure do not crash with incoming red blades.

A beautiful interface with exciting sound track, we hope you love this Survival game.

Survival Game – How to play this addictive game: -
- Move Green circle by swiping figure up / down / left / right on the screen.
- Do not crash with incoming red fiery blades.
- Move Green circle accordingly & collect 10 yellow points takes you next level.
- Share score and become highest scored player on leaderboard.

Play this highly addictive game and try to survive as long as you can. Survival game is a game with unlimited levels to keep you wondering what will come next.

We are always excited to here form you so if you have feedback on how we can make this the best Smove Survival game, please write us.
